additional_info:
Version 1.1.0 The new global design has been adapted. This means that this is for all amazon websites, including: amazon.com, amazon.de, amazon.co.uk, amazon.fr, amazon.it, amazon.es, amazon.in, amazon.com.br, amazon.com.au, amazon.co.jp, amazon.ca, amazon.com.mx, amazon.nl and more! Other changes have been implemented, including redesigning the askville archives and seller central. Version 1.0.6 All New Everything! It looks so much cleaner now. Whilst still for AMZN UK, The new design includes:
  • Redesigned buttons
  • Removed Adverts
  • New Colour Scheme
  • New Star design
It's not perfect yet, so please feel free to send feedback to make it better for you and everyone else.
